atariCore

Interface AtariKeyListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Arkanoid, FlappyBird, Game

    public interface AtariKeyListener
extends java.awt.event.KeyListener
    An extended interface to handle keyboard fast input.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean> keys
      Holding current pressed keys.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initKeys()
      initialises the game's expected keys.
      default void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent) 
      default void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent) 
      default void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent) 
      void pressKey()
      Iterates over the current keys in keys and checks if its value is true to be pressed.
